subject: Re: [junit] Before/After
msgSnippet: Good In the meantime, you might consider adding a alias and deprecating the current version to get the wheels turning. S ... Steve Freeman
messageBody:
Good

In the meantime, you might consider adding a alias and deprecating the
current version to get the wheels turning.

S

On 17 Sep 2008, at 14:17, kentb wrote:
> Thanks for catching this. The "punning" use of classes as suites is an
> implementation detail, not essential to the model. The next time we
> look at
> the API we'll think about how to represent and name the concept
> differently.
>
> Cheers,
>
> Kent
>

Steve Freeman
http://www.mockobjects.com

Winner of the Agile Alliance Gordon Pask award 2006
